item.title: Roku Gin
item.description: Roku Gin is a premium Japanese gin that is produced by the House of Suntory. The name “roku” means “six” in Japanese, and this gin gets its name from the six traditional Japanese botanicals used to craft it. In addition to these six botanicals, Roku Gin also includes eight other traditional gin botanicals, resulting in a complex and balanced flavor profile. The six traditional Japanese botanicals used in Roku Gin include sakura flower, sakura leaf, yuzu peel, sencha tea, gyokuro tea, and sansho pepper.
